package quadrilateral;
public class quadrilateral {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
     int A=80;
     int B=70;
     int C=100;
     int D=110;
     if(A+B+C+D==360) {
    	 System.out.println("valid Quadrilateral");
     }
     else {
    	 System.out.println("invalid Quadrilateral");
     }
	}

}
